Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Ate hizara vali'am ne vi rasulam tom inakara kita
Ate asim unham nu apani'am nisani'am diti'am, para uha usa tom' muha pherade rahe
Ate uha paharam nu kata ke unham vica ghara bana'unde sana. Tam ki uha uthe santi nala rahi sakana
Tam unham nu savera de sama ika bhi'anaka cika ne phara li'a
Ate unham da kita unham de kujha vi kama na a'i'a

Ate asim akasam ate dharati vica ate jo kujha inham de vicakara hai, nira'udesa nahim bana'i'a. Ate ko'i saka nahim ki ki'amata a'una vali hai. Isa la'i tusim khima karo ate bhale vihara tom kama lavo
Besaka tuhada raba sari'am da racanahara ate jananavala hai
Ate asim tuhanu sata masani ate mahana kura'ana bakhasi'a
Tusim sasarika padaratham vala akha cuka ke na dekho, jihare asim alaga-alaga lokam nu dite hana ate unham upara gama na karo, imana vali'am la'i apane pi'ara di'am baham phaila devo
Ate akho ki mai ika sapasata bhai bhita karana vala ham
Ise taram asim unham tukare karana vali'am upara vi utari'a si
Jinham ne apane kura'ana nu tukare-tukare kara dita
Isa la'i tere raba di sahu asim unham sari'am nu zarura puchange
Jihara kujha uha karade sana
Isa la'i jisa ziza da tuhanu hukama mili'a hai, usa nu sapasata suna devo ate musarakam (saca'i vica milavata karana vale) nu muha na la'o
Asim tuhade valom, unham mazaka karana vali'am la'i kafi ham
Jihare alaha de baî€¼rabaî€¼ra duji'am nu sarika bana'unde tam jaladi hi uha jana lainage
Ate asim janade ham ki jihara kujha uha kahide hana, usa nala tuhada dila taga huda hai
Isa la'i tusim apane raba da khusi nala gunagana karo ate sijada karana vali'am vicom bano
Ate apane raba di badagi karom. Ithom' taka ki tuhade kola va'ada kiti ho'i yakini gala a jave
